title: Indochine Banh Mi
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small storefront. The menu of sandwiches is concise, and there is a separate section that lists three veg: the buddha sandwich made with marinated grilled tofu, the veggie meatball sandwich made with tvp meatballs, and a lentil bean pate sandwich.
